text: Looking for a premium pair of wireless headphones? Then you might want to check out Sony’s ever-popular WH-1000XM4 headphones, which pack superb sound, noise-cancelling and comfort. More importantly, they are on sale right now, with up to %14 off their usual price. In terms of features, the WH-1000XM4 Wireless Headphones come with excellent active noise cancelling, in addition to impressive-sounding audio quality. The headphones feature touch controls, and can even automatically turn on using your phone’s NFC connectivity. Users can further tweak the sound via Sony’s official smartphone app, and they can also last for up to 30 hours of usage on a single charge. Check them out using the link below!
